title: Short-Intensive Course for Enhancing Cultural Proficiency (CP) for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in medical/healthcare fields and foundational understanding of multicultural environments
context.additional_context: Small-scale real-time online sessions in a BYOD environment, offering personalized feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core components of cultural proficiency (CP)
Learners can recognize and reflect on their unconscious biases through the Implicit Association Test (IAT).
Learners can propose two or more patient-centered cultural communication strategies using the Ethnocultural Empathy Inventory (EEI).
Learners can apply three or more practical skills for effectively interacting with patients from diverse cultural backgrounds.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
